BMC Cologne

Erous
Sunday, October 8th, 2017, 6:09:08 PM

Been looking awhile for the following BMC cologne, paying well for all ya got:

grey-laced green malachite flask You have the heavy scent of damp evergreen needles about you, like maoral leaves moldering on a rainforest floor. Wraithing about the outskirts of the scent are flashes of guelder rose, like a ray of sun breaking through a grey day.
